'Play', also known as 'Grupo Play', is a teen Mexican band made in 2006 out of
teenagers from the reality show for kids CÃ³digo F.A.M.A. made by the giant
company Televisa. There are 7 members in the band and only 6 out of 7 of the
band were in a telenovela from Televisa. They have already had their debut CD
released in Mexico. In their official website they state that their reality
show, and telenovelas CÃ³digo F.A.M.A., Alegrijes y Rebujos, and Mision S.O.S
is behind them. The group disbanded in 2007 because of problems with their
record label.
